channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Add remote error and timeout test. Implement a common TestService to reduce the duplicated code.

-1 overall

This message was automatically generated.

I have added a rule in dev-support/findbugs-exclude.xml to exclude the protobuf

39	  <Match>

40	    <Package name="org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.protobuf.generated"/>

41	  </Match>

I do not know why it does not work...

And the white spaces is in the generate file also.

Thanks.

I see this in findbugs-exclude.xml

  <Match>

    <!-- Nested packages are not included by the filter, so we need a regexp... -->

    <Package name="~org\.apache\.hadoop\.hbase\.tmpl\..*"/>

  </Match>



  <Match>

    <Package name="~org\.apache\.hadoop\.hbase\.generated\..*"/>

  </Match>

Maybe the same problem here? Let me have a try.

+1 Excellent.

On the white space, not sure... Hopefully your trick above does it.
I've filed HBASE-16535 to solve the findbugs problem. For the whitespace issue, let me check how yetus runs the whitespace check. I think we should not check the generated files.

OK, it just checks the git apply output...

Let me apply the patch with --whitespace=fix and generate a new patch again to remove the trailing whitespaces... I think this is fine since we change the generated file by command, not manually...
The findbugs part is done in HBASE-16535. Remove trailing whitespaces in generated proto files.

-1 overall

OK, the timeout testcase is breaked by HBASE-16519. I have posted comment there.

Will commit shortly.

Pushed to master.

Thanks stack for reviewing.
